title: JARA
content:
This font – with name inspired in Victor Jara – it's an old design, developed for latinotype foundry that will be launched at the end of this month. (august)

Two faces, rounded y normal.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816170644im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lonconao_5866.gif)
author: jko

comments.content:
Hey, thanks, for me was very hard to translate "handpicked" I'm from chile and speak spanish. I understood that is something like "chosen with care," I guess it's good, no? jaja. thanxs.
